headline: Vistra Corp. (VST) is Continuing its Upward Trajectory
summary: Sound Shore Management, an investment management firm, has released its investor letter for the first quarter of 2025. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund’s Investor Class (SSHFX) and Institutional Class (SSHVX) declined 1.93% and 1.89% respectively, in the first quarter of 2025 compared to a 2.14% return for the Russell […]

headline: 6 charts that capture Nvidia's AI-fueled rise
summary: With soaring profits and sales, Nvidia's stock has quickly become one of the most influential stocks in the S&P 500 since the launch of ChatGPT.
